articles.description: Data from NASA's InSight mission shows that Mars's rotation is speeding up and its days are growing slightly shorter. Scientists have a few ideas why.

Like an ice skater tucking their arms for an elegant spin, the planet Mars
 appears to be rotating slightly faster with each passing year. 
In a paper published June 14 in the journal Nature
, ast… [+2256 chars]

articles.author: Mark Kaufman
articles.title: NASA's ambitious robots find each other in the Mars desert - Mashable
articles.description: A mission to sleuth for signs of past life.
